title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dead cat means victory over the enemy and other interpretations that we will explain to the unmarried, married, pregnant or divorced girl, such as the corpse of a cat or a dead white cat or the death of black or white cats from a dying cat for Ibn Sirin, and others in continuation of the topic. Interpretation of a dead cat in a dream Seeing a dead cat in a dream The interpretation of this vision is related to the color of the cat. If the color of the dead cat is not white, this indicates that there are some things that you have not paid enough attention to. As for dead cats, if they are white, this indicates the sadness you will feel due to an accident or unfortunate event that will happen soon. Anyone who sees a dead cat in a dream, this means that he took his place, job, or something of no importance, and an indication that he heard the news of someone's death and you will see harm from someone in family and professional life. Seeing a dead cat come back to life in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into situations that he cannot bear and bad situations, but at the present time he will not expect that, and his work will go well. Seeing a dead cat in a dream, because the cat in general indicates a malicious person, and for this reason seeing a dead cat in a dream indicates the death of the owner of these qualities or his imprisonment, and sometimes this vision shows the end of the war and the organization of your relationships with people. Seeing a dead cat in the house in a dream This vision shows a thief entering your house, or indicates a person who will harm you, or a person who will appear to you as a friend but is in fact an enemy, so the person who sees this vision must beware of people. His environment. The presence of a dead cat in the house sometimes indicates unhappiness and acquaintance with useless people and you will see evil from these people. And whoever sees a dead cat in a dream, this vision shows the person who wants to take something from you, otherwise he will harm you. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing a dead cat in the street in a dream This vision shows an illness that will affect you for a short period of time, and the person who sees such a vision will recover within a week, and sometimes this vision shows the fulfillment of your desires and aspirations. Ibn Sirin also tells us about this vision Dead black cats in a dream It indicates the sorrows and worries that may afflict the dreamer as a result of some wrong actions. The presence of a dead cat in a dream indicates the end of sorrows and the end of problems

title: Interpretation of a dream about gunpowder according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing gunpowder in a dream means spending money and other concepts, and we will mention it for unmarried people, married people, pregnant women, divorced people, and men, for example. Gunpowder, or for those who saw gunpowder shots, or the shooting of gunpowder at a wedding, or the sound of gunpowder or cartridges, or a person being shot, or the ignition of black powder by Ibn Sirin and others, in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of gunpowder in a dream Gunpowder in a dream is a lot of money that Spending on things that will not bring any benefit to the dreamer, and a little gunpowder in a dream is better than a lot of gunpowder, because a lot of gunpowder in a dream indicates exposure. To great material losses. Whoever sees that he collects gunpowder in a dream, he collects money, and the ignition of gunpowder indicates the destruction of money for some state affairs, such as completing a deal or something of that nature. A vision of what becomes of gunpowder of all kinds, used in war and otherwise, is rhetorical talk. The culmination of burning or harm, and if it does not harm, then words have no effect or benefit. Shooting a gun in war indicates serious problems that may last for a long time. Dreaming of loading a gun, with cartridges or bullets, is a strong warning not to give in to a bad mood. Dreaming of gunpowder indicates a change A sudden change at work for a man, and for a woman it is an unexpected change in place of residence.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params ': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');And hunting pigeons with gunpowder indicates elevation, the removal of worries and comfort, and most often it indicates livelihood and a lot of money. In general, ammunition, cartridges and gunpowder in a single girl’s dream It has connotations related to profit or livelihood as evidenced by saving time and may indicate saving money because money is similar to ammunition in that it represents the reasons or means of victory in the battle of life. Gunpowder in a married woman’s dream can indicate gossip, slander, and hurtful words, and a woman who sees in Her dream that someone calls her gunpowder could expose herself to moral or material harm. Interpretation of gunpowder in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpreter of dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, says that a dream about gunpowder means that you should be more careful and have a lot of confidence in what you are doing. Also, seeing black gunpowder in The dream means that you should avoid some dangerous situation. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Gunpowder also indicates that you are...

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Tariq in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Surat Al-Tariq in a dream There are many questions about seeing Surat Al-Tariq in a dream. When a person sees or hears the Qur’an being read, he feels many emotions between happiness and fear. The vision can be a message of good news of the arrival of happy events and expresses God Almighty’s satisfaction with the dreamer, but on the other hand it can promise a warning of evil as a result of sins and forbidden things, so we will present all interpretations of the vision during the next lines as follows. Surah Al-Tariq in a dream, the favorite of many interpretation scholars. One of the good interpretations of seeing Surat Al-Tariq in a dream, as the vision shows that the dreamer has good morals and his desire to approach the Lord Almighty with reverence and good deeds, and therefore God Almighty has provided him abundantly. livelihood and enjoys blessings and success in his life, and if he desires good offspring, he announces his multiple male and female offspring, God willing. Whenever the dreamer recites Surah Al-Tariq in a beautiful and sweet voice, and within him is a feeling of humility and supplication to God Almighty, this is a good sign that his repentance will be accepted in reality, and his distance from All abominations. He committed it in the past, but thanks to his trust in God Almighty and his constant supplication for repentance and forgiveness, he is granted a comfortable life filled with blessings and goodness.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width': 300, 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Surat Al-Tariq in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Surat Al-Tariq in a dream represents the way out and the way out of every distress and anguish that a person experiences in the current period of his life. . God Almighty helps him and enables him to pay his debts and fulfill all his duties towards his family. The dream is also evidence that the dreamer is one of those who remember God often and always tries to do good and help those in need. If a person sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Tariq in a dream, then he is close to achieving all his hopes and dreams after a long-term effort and making a lot of efforts for it. He will also reach a prominent position in society and become a great meaning and a word heard among the people, and if the dreamer is suffering from distress... And anxiety and burdens accumulating on his shoulders, so the dream is a good omen for him that all problems will leave his life, and he will enjoy them. Happiness and peace of mind. Surat Al-Tariq in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is listening or reading Surah Al-Tariq in a dream, this vision proves that she is a righteous and religious person who wants to perform religious obligations in the best way so that she can obtain the satisfaction of God Almighty. She is also characterized by God Almighty’s satisfaction and glorification of good and evil. As a result, her life is filled with peace and tranquility, thanks to her trust in God Almighty in all matters of her life. He gives her success and success until she achieves her ambitions.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe '

title: Interpretation of seeing a fan in a dream: Seeing a ceiling fan in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a fan indicates the end of problems and other interpretations. We will translate it for single people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, such as buying an electric or ceiling fan, turning on a table fan, falling a hand fan, or dreaming of a white fan by Ibn Sirin and others in continuation. From the topic: Interpretation of a fan in a dream Seeing a fan in a dream symbolizes comfort and freedom from the problems and difficulties that surround the dreamer. The fan in your dream indicates the wife and children if the dreamer is married, and it indicates engagement and marriage if the dreamer is a single young man or girl. Whoever sees that the fan is placed on palm branches, this indicates wealth and material gains that he will obtain from some profitable business deals. Whoever sees In his dream, he is admired among people, this indicates people’s great love for him and the comfort they feel around him. If the dreamer is a girl and sees that she was using a fan in her dream for ventilation or that there is someone using a fan for ventilation, then this indicates the expansion of the horizons of her social relationships and the acquisition of new acquaintances. Whoever dreams at night that he lost his old admirer, this indicates the loss of friendship in his life and the loss of some friends as a result of their concern for others. Whoever dreams that a follower is present by his side, regardless of his guidance, this indicates the presence of a friend who comforts him, especially in times of adversity and difficulties, and provides He has all the necessary help.In our dreams, a fan is often a symbol of change. Let's say you dreamed about a fan yesterday or the night before. In this case, this could be a sign that your life is about to undergo some new changes in the near future, and these changes will have wide-ranging impacts on everything from how productive you feel at work to your mood swings.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d' , 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Interpretation of a ceiling fan in a dreamTo have a ceiling fan in your dream running and emitting cold air means that soon you will hear good news and surprises. This vision also tells you that you You will be able to escape from your current sadness, and look forward to the upcoming events and happy life. Interpretation of an electric fan in a dream If you dream of seeing an electric fan, this may indicate that you will leave in the upcoming holidays without problems and change important things in your life. This vision also shows that it is It is necessary to take some time for yourself and think about your life, so there are no negative consequences if you take a well-deserved break. Interpretation of a battery-powered fan in a dream Seeing a battery-powered fan is a sign that you do not have to worry about negative things and you do not need to sit and wait for events because this is not the life that We live it and all the things that can happen

Interpretation of a battery-powered fan in a dream Seeing a battery-powered fan is a sign that you do not have to worry about negative things and you do not need to sit and wait for events because this is not the life that We live it and all the things that can happen

title: Interpretation of a food tray in a dream Seeing a tray in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a disc shows spending money and other interpretations. Sometimes the Chinese in a dream show success from God, and this vision is a sign that the fortuneteller is good at controlling his nerves and is not reckless when facing difficult situations. title: Interpretation of a dream about a doll by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Doll in a dreamThere are many and varied interpretations of seeing a doll in a dream, and the interpreters differed in determining whether it is a good vision or a warning to the dreamer, because it can appear in several ways that have a noticeable effect. About changing the interpretation of the dream, because it may appear cut or broken, and at that time the vision is reprehensible. Or it has a beautiful and happy shape, and thus it indicates the arrival of happy events. If you are one of the dreamers of this vision, you can follow the following lines to learn about its interpretations. The doll in a dream The doll in dreams Some interpreters agreed that seeing a doll is a promising dream, because it is one of the signs of positive changes that will occur in the dreamer's life, and it is also a symbol of his strength, courage and good behavior in matters. This makes it easier for him to achieve his goals, hopes and ambitions, after getting rid of all the difficulties and obstacles that prevent him from achieving them. However, if the viewer sees it in a suspicious way that arouses fear and panic, it shows the reprehensible interpretations, which may be represented in being exposed to a huge financial crisis, suffering from poverty and a significant deterioration in the social level, and it also leads to problems and conflicts that lead to suffering and put him in a state of permanent tension and turmoil and loss of the sense of comfort and peace. document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The doll in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a doll in a dream with many commendable words that make a person happy with his life after getting rid of problems and crises. If the doll is broken or cut, this proves that he has committed sins and disobedience, and walked the path of forbidden things, and he must review himself and get closer to God Almighty before the time comes for repentance. If the dreamer sees that his beautiful doll has become very ugly and he is afraid to approach it, this indicates a change in his circumstances for the worse, and hardships and hardships control his life, so he becomes sad and disturbed and loses his passion. At work and achieves achievements, but if he sees that he is fixing it and adjusting his appearance, then most people are patient and have the will and determination sufficient to succeed and achieve their desires, and God knows best. The doll in a single woman's dream. Experts in translation indicated that the unmarried woman's vision of the doll in her dream reflects the psychological state she is going through at the present time. This may indicate the girl's need for attention and care from her family members, as she does not feel safe and at peace as she did in her childhood and sees that she bears more burdens. And responsibilities at an early age put her in a state of mental and spiritual conflict permanently. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt

title: Interpretation of gold bullion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Gold bullion in a dream. Gold is one of the precious metals that all people strive to obtain to ensure a bright future full of material prosperity and well-being. It is also used as an ornament for decoration because of its wonderful shape and bright yellow color, and for this reason, interpretive scholars have pointed out the good connotations of seeing it in a dream, but interpretations differ if the dreamer sees gold bullion in a dream. ; We will mention this in the following lines according to the different visual situations, so follow us. Gold bullion in a dream There are many good interpretations of seeing gold bullion in a dream, as it is one of the visions that call for optimism and optimism about the upcoming events in the dreamer’s life, as the dream wishes him that positive changes are on the verge. This will raise his standard of living and make him very happy. Prosperity and happiness, but he must work hard and diligently and take advantage of the available opportunities to the best of his ability. Some commentators also mentioned that gold bullion is an indicator of the stability of the fortuneteller’s circumstances and his enjoyment of an abundance of blessings and good things, so he must constantly praise God and thank him for the blessings, success, and eternal enjoyment. Blessings in his life, but if a person is suffering from problems and crises in the current period, then seeing that dream indicates the approaching Gulf and his freedom from worries and worries, so that he can enjoy comfort and psychological peace.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Gold bullion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned many meanings and interpretations of seeing gold bullion, according to the variety of events narrated by the dreamer, so he explained that gold bullion in general It shows the dreamer's goodness and his arrival at the place he has always been trying to reach. By obtaining a new job or a partnership in a successful business that will bring him huge profits and he will be close to his dreams and hopes. The dream is also a message warning of the importance of preparing for some of the changes that will occur in his life, because it gives him good news about his high status among people due to his assuming a prominent position in society. He has to carry out his responsibilities, but despite the good interpretations of the vision, it carries a warning to the dreamer of the need to avoid exaggeration and buying useless things, so as not to lose his money and fall into many crises and dilemmas from which it is difficult to get out. Gold bullion in a dream for a single woman, if an unmarried girl sees it Gold bullion in her dream, so she should be happy, because it carries for her many good symbols and beautiful meanings, so it can herald success in her life and achieve many achievements, whether scientific or practical. It will reach the desired position in the near future, so the dream is considered one of the elements of abundant livelihood and abundance of good things in life.

title: Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the king in a dream is one of the visions that express power and prestige, but speaking with the king and shaking hands with him is an indication of the visionary’s effort to enjoin good and forbid evil, except in the eyes of His Highness. dreamer. To adhere to the rules, laws, and all legislation, through this article we will learn about their different meanings. Seeing the great jurists and interpreters. Seeing the king in a dream. Seeing the king in a dream represents a lot of sustenance and that the dreamer will soon obtain a great king. It is also a sign of prestige and power, according to Ibn Kathir. As for going to the king and talking to him about a matter, it means a high position and an effort to achieve a goal and he will win it. Seeing a just king in a dream represents the achievement of justice, uprightness, and the return of truth, but if the king is unjust, then this is a sign of corruption and injustice and their spread in society. Al-Usaimi says: Clashing with kings in a dream is a warning of rebellion and the emergence of a great war. If you see in your dream that you have become a king, this is a sign of gaining status, glory, honor and reputation in society, and it also expresses the ease of things and the achievement of goals and requirements in life. Seeing a king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin says Ibn Sirin: Dreaming about the king and talking to him portends abundant livelihood and a comfortable life for the dreamer. It is a sign of tyranny and the presence of many obstacles in life. Talking to the king when he is angry indicates that you are having a lot of problems with people in power and may portend problems at work. Shaking hands with kings in dreams is the fulfillment of expected dreams, in addition to the novelist’s desire to comply with the principles of And the laws of the country, but shaking hands with an unjust king means a leap to achieve interests. Kissing the king in a dream is an expression of a great position that the dreamer will obtain soon, but seeing the king in rough clothing expresses the ruler’s arbitrariness and severe injustice towards the people. Seeing the king in a dream for Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi says: If the priest sees that the king is giving him a gift, then this is a sign of taking responsibility and exalting the matter, but if the priest is the one offering the gift, it means that he is courting the superiors to meet demands. Receiving a gift from a dead king is a mention of benevolence and a declaration that he is a just king, but if The king distributed gifts to the common people, as this indicates his willingness to help people, extend a helping hand to them, and refuse gifts. From the king. A gift from Al-Nabulsi is an indication of the loss of an important opportunity for the fortuneteller. Seeing the king in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Shaheen says in interpreting the king’s vision of an unmarried woman in a dream that this is evidence of her high status in life in general, but if the king addresses her, it is an expression of wisdom and guidance in life. A dream about the king’s silk clothes was interpreted as an increase in price, the ability to achieve goals, and an abundance of money. Seeing that the king gives a gift to a girl is good news for her to marry someone with a high social status. As for a dream in which he gives her money, this indicates that she will soon find... You have a job where you earn a lot.

title: Interpretation of old clothes in a dream and wearing old clothes in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about old clothes shows a lot of sustenance and nostalgia for the past, and other interpretations that we will explain to single people, married people, pregnant women, and divorced women, such as wearing old clothes, giving old clothes, buying old used clothes, or the person wearing old clothes according to Ibn Sirin, and others, in continuation of the following topic: Interpretation of old clothes in a dream, seeing clothes. Old clothes in a dream, if they are clean and tidy, mean the return of a relationship between two people after a separation or quarrel that lasted for years, and old, torn clothes indicate illness, as well as the death of a loved one. One or a close person, and the clothes of the deceased show goodness to his family, and torn clothes show estrangement between the family, and are in the interpretation of rivalry and enmity. Worn clothes indicate unhappiness. If the clothes are torn in a dream, and he is able to repair the same, then he is bewitched, and if the tears do not repair the same, then he will have a son. Wearing an old dress is an indication of returning to the person and marrying him, and perhaps it refers to a person who carries his qualities. Or his name, and the vision shows your nostalgia for the old things that you left behind and were looking for. them again and try to restore old relationships. Old clothes in a dream are attributed to people who have memories and it also means solving long-awaited problems and means meeting old friends.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing old clothes, but they are organized and arranged, but these clothes belong to the deceased. Seeing old clothes, if they are not organized and organized, or otherwise, or they may be torn. Or torn, this vision indicates a quarrel with family and relatives. Seeing worn clothes in a dream that are no longer useful to wear, even if they are old, means that the dreamer is experiencing a period of unhappiness, despair, anxiety and sadness, and with great regret this vision is a reflection of the psychological state of the opinion As for seeing a lot of old clothes, it means shirts, pants, and dresses, and these clothes were clean, which indicates the abundance of livelihood that will come to you in the future, God willing. Interpretation of wearing old clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirinja. In the interpretation of Ibn Sirin: Old clothes in a dream indicate trouble. It is best in the dream for the dreamer to see new clothes. Old clothes are interpreted poorly if they are worn, have patches, or smell bad. Used clothes are also disliked in the dream because they are an expression of dealing with crises and poverty. If you dream that you are wearing worn out clothes, then this It represents your anxiety and fear about your image and appearance. Perhaps you lack self-esteem. Interpretation of old and clean clothes in a dream: Seeing old clothes, but they are
